synopsis.text:
Akechi and Hiroshi, two high school students, navigate the complexities of first love in 'Musunde Hiraite', a Japanese anime named after a children's song that translates to 'Closed Hands, Open Hands'. Hiroshi, smitten by the captivating senior Himari Asaki on his first day of high school, relentlessly pursues her, despite her persistent evasion. Unbeknownst to him, Himari harbors a secret fear of men, causing her to keep her distance.

Meanwhile, Akechi, Hiroshi's friend, maintains a detailed notebook filled with information about the girls in their school. His professional curiosity piques when he encounters an introverted and quiet girl, leading him to delve deeper into her life. As he uncovers her secrets, Akechi finds himself developing feelings beyond mere curiosity.

'Musunde Hiraite' is an ensemble narrative that explores various high school love stories, shifting focus between different students and their romantic endeavors. Will Hiroshi find a way to capture Himari's heart despite her evasiveness, and will Akechi's investigation lead to an unexpected romance? This anime offers a captivating exploration of love, fear, and the thrill of discovery in the high school realm.
